exploreUrl:
@js:
var sort = [];
push=(title,link,size)=>sort.push({
    "title": title,
    "url": link,
    "style": {
      "layout_flexGrow": 1,
       "layout_flexBasisPercent": size
    }
  });
push("男主角🔹♂️按分类","",1);
tags=["玄幻","奇幻","武侠","仙侠",
"灵异","科幻","游戏","竞技",
"职场","都市","历史","军事","轻小说",
"同人","其他"].map((t,i)=>push(
	java.t2s(t), `https://gg.zzxsa.com/booksort/list?gender=0&type=star&major=${t}&minor=&start={{(page-1)*20}}&limit=20&language=zh_cn`, 
	 t.length > 2 ? 0.25 : 0.2) );
	 push("男主角🔹♂️按题材","",1);
